## RedemptionDetails.actualARTHAmount property

Amount of ARTH that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actualARTHAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attemptedARTHAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Troves.
